headline.main: Ceremonies in Belgium Mark 3 Decades Since Ferry Sinking
headline.print_headline: Ceremonies in Belgium Mark 3 Decades Since Ferry Sinking

lead_paragraph: Three decades after the capsizing of the British ferry Herald of Free Enterprise, victims' families are sailing out to the scene of the disaster to remember the 193 who died.
snippet: Three decades after the capsizing of the British ferry Herald of Free Enterprise, victims' families are sailing out to the scene of the disaster to remember the 193 who died....
